page.title: 09ATTITUDES
page.content: Most of the people interveiwed regard this area as a very pleasant one to live in.Many reasons were given .It is a quiet rural area,free from the fumes and pollution of the big cities .There are plenty of footpaths and bridleways along which people can enjoy the fresh country air.It is however within easy reach of the market towns of Ruthin and Denbigh,and also a short drive from larger centres such as Liverpool and Chester.Many of the people travel out of the area to work and access to main roads and motorways is important.There are good leisure facilities such as swimming pools,sports centres,cinemas and theares in the vicinity.People of the area are pleasant and there is a strong comunity spirit.
